definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: (face of God, cf. GFM: Ju Jdg 8:8; late As. Panîli Hilpr:Univ. Pa. Exp. ix. 68);—Fanouhl, but in Gn ei)=dov (tou=) qeou=:

definitions.title: 1. loc.
definitions.body: E. of Jordan, near Jabbok Ge 32:32, Ju Jdg 8:8, Jdg 8:8, Jdg 8:9, Jdg 8:17, 1Ki 12:25 = [[פְּנִיאֵל]] Ge 32:31: site unknown; v. esp. Paine:Bib.Sac.1878,481 ff.
